multiple_choice_question.text: What is the main advantage of using extended-precision (EX) arithmetic compared to double-precision (DP) in the context of this study?
choices: EX arithmetic completely eliminates round-off errors.
EX arithmetic offers a significant speed improvement over DP while maintaining acceptable accuracy.
EX arithmetic requires less memory than DP, making it more suitable for large-scale simulations.
EX arithmetic is fully compatible with existing N-body code without any modifications.
